message.body: Fwd: Make sure dad knows dot is wanting to do dog and duck tonight...since he is going with oma tomorrow that might work out well, plus you have winnings.
Its at 630 and i will be back as soon as i can. Have to do a little painting first.
kk. if you can't it's okay.
oh crud. Will you need to come home before trivia?
i wouldn't mind, but i don't really need to if you bring me a sweater and a hairbrush. mom's leaving for gahagan in a few minutes if that's more convenient
Could she drop you at Phils?
yeah, that's fine. if i take care of the pets now will they be okay until the morning?
Sure. In the winter this is the regular time! Phil also has left them as long as ten pm too once. They are flexible.
